channel.title: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?
channel.description: Should I put a hyperion game engine for PI or no? Would it just be better to make my own game engine? btw wrong section mod please move.

item.title: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Jmood:

Both use the executor service to handle tasks

I can’t speak for Hyperion because I’ve never used it, but PI uses a cycle based task system and uses a while loop on the main thread to run the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?

item.title: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:21, topic:541957”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=660829.msg4425350#msg4425350 date=1400588461]

Actually, if I am not mistaken, PI is event based and Hyperion is task based…

lol what…
[/quote]
I think he meant that PI schedules tasks where Hyperion goes through each one 1 by 1 or however they work.[/quote]

Both use the executor service to handle tasks, Hyperion just does it even more so than PI until people started ripping the code.

Read full topic

item.source: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?

item.title: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:14, topic:541957”][quote author=xxxtilllyxxx link=topic=660829.msg4425124#msg4425124 date=1400482322]
PI is cycle-based whereas Hyperion is event-based. It wouldn’t work out. You’d have to change most of the core functions for it to have any difference. A
[/quote]Actually, if I am not mistaken, PI is event based and Hyperion is task based…[/quote]

PI uses Cycle events, but is still based off a procedural style code. Everything is sent in order to be processed, and there’s loads of deadlocks, etc. Everything shares the same thread. I don’t fully remember how Hyperion is ran, but I could have sworn it was event based. I guess it may be task based. Either way, events and tasks’ are literally almost the same thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?

item.title: Hyperion Game engine for PI or no?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You seem to not be understanding the concept of a ‘game engine’. The GameEngine class in Hyperion (afaik) provides the basic skeleton game processing logic. Pasting it into your PI will not magically make it better.

tl;dr Don’t use PI.

Read full topic
